channel.title: Romance on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Romance on Strat

item.title: The Ministry of Time
item.description: A woman working for the Ministry of Time is tasked with helping assimilate a sailor pulled through time, who more than a hundred years prior was on a doomed Arctic expedition and would have died otherwise. Hijinks ensue.

item.title: The Last Herald-Mage Trilogy
item.description: Sad/mad gay wizards doing sad/mad gay wizard things.

item.title: Maybe Next Time
item.description:
This was the first romance novel I’ve read. Sometimes you have to unleash your inner mom and read a book by a mom for moms.

I’m about as far from a mom as you can get but despite that, Cesca Major pulled me in with her writing in a way that I wasn’t expecting.
